name: Sunrider - A Space Visual Novel/Tactical RPG
blurb: Captain your star ship and lead your squad of mecha pilots to victory.

rewards.reward: Thank-you for your contribution!\r\n\r\nYour name will be listed as a contributor in the credits!

Cadet:  Your journey is only beginning.

Everything above +
We will mail you a signed Sunrider thank-you card along with assorted other Sunrider memorabilia.

Red shirt:  Welcome aboard.  Just try to avoid the laser fire.

Everything above +
Early access! Play the game before it is released! You gain access to all Sunrider betas.

Ensign: You've survived countless away missions fraught with peril and are ready to save the ship by reversing the energy polarity!

Everything above +
Physical media! Get a CD and DVD case when Sunrider is released! (***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

***SPECIAL TIER: DIGITAL ONLY:
This is a special tier for those who are not interested in physical media.  This tier does not include the above items.

Have too much office clutter? Or is your local mailman too unreliable? No worries, this special tier was made for you.

Includes: Digital thank-you card (receive in Jan 2014), beta code (receive in Jan 2014), digital poster (receive in Jan 2014), and a digital version of the full color art book (receive upon completion of game)

DIGITAL TIER MARK II
Our final hours are upon this. Ready yourself for the coming battle with these add-ons.
+Everything in the prior Digital Tier
+EXCLUSIVE in-game item: INVASION DRONES. Tired of always being out numbered? These drones will infiltrate enemy capital ships and turn the ship against its own fleet before causing the ship to self destruct! A must have for any guerrilla captain. (Receive on completion of game)
+Become part of the legend! Name a ship, minor character, or locale after yourself!
+Digital hi-res dakimakura! Choose from a set of designs. (Receive March 2014)
NOTE: These awards are also included in all tiers $75 and up.

Junior Lieutenant:  You're working your way up the ranks...

Everything above + signed Sunrider poster
(***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

AIR MAN: All wings, report in!
This tier includes the following awards.
+2.5 inch tall 3D printed Black Jack model (March 2014)
+Beta access (After Kickstarter)
+Digital thank you card (After Kickstarter)
+Digital poster (After Kickstarter)
(NOTICE: This tier does not include any rewards in the lower tiers, and is NOT included in any of the higher tiers)

Lieutenant:  You're finally in command! Reroute power to shields and charge lasers!

Everything above+
Premium collector's edition box + 
20+ page black and white art book
(***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

Commander:  You're now second only to the captain!

Everything above+
40+ page color art book!
(***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

ACE PILOT: For hot shots only.
INCLUDES:
+2.5 inch 3D printed Black Jack (Receive Mar 2014)
+DVD case and game CD (Receive when game is complete)
+Physical Sunrider poster (Receive Mar 2014)
+Physical Thank you card (Receive Mar 2014)
+Digital color art book (Receive when game is complete)
+Digital black and white art book (Receive when game is complete)
+Digital dakimakura (Choose from designs, receive Mar 2014)
+Beta access (Receive after Kickstarter)
 (NOTICE: This tier does not include any rewards in the lower tiers, and is NOT included in any of the higher tiers)

Captain: Truly, only the bravest captain is deserving of this...

Everything above+
Signed dakimakura cover (choose from provided designs)
(***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

STAR FIGHTER: With wings like this, the stars are yours.
INCLUDES: 6 inch 3D printed Black Jack model (Receive March 2014) + beta code (Receive after Kickstarter) + digital poster (Receive after Kickstarter) + digital thank you card (Receive after Kickstarter) + digital color art book (Receive upon completion of game) + black and white art book (Receive upon completion of game) + digital dakimakura (Choose from designs, receive March 2014) + Invasion drones + Name a side character/planet/ship/location

(NOTICE: This tier does not include any rewards in the lower tiers, and is NOT included in any of the higher tiers)

Admiral:  The galaxy is yours.

Everything above+
A free copy of all future Love in Space games + Another custom made dakimakura (you chose from the eight girls, you choose pose) + Design a ship in the game
(***Additional fees may apply outside North America)

HERO OF JUSTICE: Justice is your shield and courage is your sword.
INCLUDES:
+6 inch signed 3D printed Black Jack model (Receive Mar 2014)
+beta code (Receive after Kickstarter)
+Game CD and DVD case (Receive on completion of the game)
+Collector's edition box (Receive on completion of game)
+Physical thank you card (Receive Mar 2014)
+Physical signed poster (Receive Mar 2014)
+Physical black and white art book (Receive on completion of game)
+Physical color art book (Receive on completion of game)
+Physical dakimakura cover (Choose from designs, receive Mar 2014)
+Everything in the two digital tiers
+Free copy of all future Love in Space games
 (NOTICE: This tier does not include any rewards in the lower tiers, and is NOT included in any of the higher tiers)
